name: CUBE (NES)
description:
What is CUBE? 
CUBE did not come from anywhere, in fact, CUBE created the universe as we know it, the only drawback is CUBE could not manifest itself.. until now. CUBE conjured up every last bit of his omnipotent strength and was able to manifest in this 8-bit game. It's not much, but it's the best we could do for now.

No, really, what is CUBE?
Cube is an action platformer currently under development using NES Maker, with music by The Realm Recordings (https://the-realm-recordings.itch.io/). Designed for speed runners, but forgiving enough for casual players, we have a speedrun board at https://www.speedrun.com/cube_nes
